front.title: Additional Algorithms and Identifiers for RSA Cryptography for use in the Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile

abstract.t: This document supplements RFC 3279. It describes the conventions for using the RSASSA-PSS signature algorithm, the RSAES-OAEP key transport algorithm, and additional one-way hash functions with the PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature algorithm in the Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure (PKI). Encoding formats, algorithm identifiers, and parameter formats are specified.
